description:
April 27, 2017 / Addendum host D. Watkins is joined by Undisclosed: The Killing of Freddie Gray host Amelia McDonell-Parry, as well as guest panelists Simone Browne and Wendy Osefo.

Special thanks to our sponsors!
www.huntakiller.com/solve
www.upside.com/biztrip
 
Episode scoring music by Patrick Cortes, Ramiro Marquez, Blue Dot Sessions, and FMG Dez.
